short_summary: Be building 20 ANTENNA  and 20 BATTERY ASSEMBLY for the Department of National Defence.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for 20 ANTENNA and 20 BATTERY ASSEMBLY to be built by a competitor/contractor and delivered to the 25 CFSD Monteal.
duration_in_months: There is an expectation that the contract will be in effect for some time in 2024.
full_summary:
# **Beacon Techtest 500-27EBY and spares parts**
============================================

## **Government Solicitation Details**
----------------------------------

* **Reference Number**: cb-86-38228580
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247861/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-11
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-14T14:00:00 (expired)

## **Goods and Services Requirements**
------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence seeks bids for the procurement of the following items:

* Item 1: Antenna (Part No.: 10-274-3, NCAGE: K6543)
	+ Quantity: 20
	+ Unit of Measure: EA
	+ Delivery Location: 25 CFSD Montreal by January 2024
* Item 2: Battery Assembly (Part No.: A01112Y, NCAGE: U2615)
	+ Quantity: 20
	+ Unit of Measure: EA
	+ Delivery Location: 25 CFSD Montreal by January 2024

## **Tender Instructions**
-------------------------

Bidders are encouraged to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## **Provincial Trade Agreements**
--------------------------------

This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## **Electronic Access**
---------------------

The notice and solicitation documents are available at the following website: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)

## **Contact Information**
-------------------------

For further information, please contact:

Audrée Poissant-Viau
audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca

Please ensure to clearly indicate the brand name and model, or Part Number, and NCAGE of any equivalent or substitute products offered.

This tender has expired. Please refer to the Canadian Government Procurement website for active solicitations. [procurement.gc.ca](http://procurement.gc.ca) 

Format Modifiactions Différentes
---------------------------------

 Change from UU (Unity Unit) is removed. Separated the list of technical data for the goods in it's own section. Inserted CA or FR header Languages identifications and explicitly marked the simultaneously bid documents in an additional section 'Submission Language Options'
